
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2025-04-14 23:09:04.565379                #
######################################


#leader_trait_buccaneer_3 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
        has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_buccaneer }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_common = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
        }
    }
}

xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_defence_engineer_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_defence_engineer_2
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_defence_engineer }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_defence_engineer_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_common = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_defence_engineer_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_defence_engineer_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
        }
    }
}

        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 } }
    }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_fleet_organizer }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_common = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 }

        }

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_politician_2

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_politician }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_politician_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_common = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_politician_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 }

        }
    }

#leader_trait_border_guard_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_border_guard_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_border_guard_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_border_guard_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_border_guard }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_border_guard_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_veteran = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_border_guard_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_border_guard_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_border_guard_3
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_border_guard_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
        }
    }
}

            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_home_guard_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes

        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_intimidator_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_armorer #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_armorer_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_armorer } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_armorer
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_armorer }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_armorer_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_armorer }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_armorer
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_armorer }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_aturion_organizer #destiny trait

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_aturion_organizer } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_aturion_organizer
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_aturion_organizer }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_aturion_organizer }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_aturion_organizer
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_aturion_organizer }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_bellicose } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_bellicose
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_bellicose }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_bellicose }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_bellicose
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_bellicose }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes

    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_educator }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }

        }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes

        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }

        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_maven_of_war } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_maven_of_war
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_maven_of_war }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_maven_of_war }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_maven_of_war
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_maven_of_war }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_military_overseer } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_military_overseer
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes

    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_military_overseer }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_military_overseer }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_military_overseer
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_military_overseer }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_peacekeeper
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_peacekeeper_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_peacekeeper
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }
